name: Dhaka
description: Dhaka has a renowned culinary heritage. The city's culture is known for its rickshaws, biryani, art festivals and religious diversity.

name: Mymensingh
description: The town is home to a number of tourist attractions, including the Mymensingh Museum, the Mymensingh Zoo, and the Mymensingh Rajbari.

name: Khulna
description: The district has many historical monuments, relics and ancient mosques that are great places to visit. It also contains the largest mangrove forest in the world

name: Rajshahi
description: Fine and cheap silk products of Rajshahi have earned it the nickname Silk City. Rajshahi is also well known for its fruits, especially for Mango and Lychee.

name: Chittagong
description: It has many popular attractions, including Foy's Lake, Guliakhali Sea Beach, Boga Lake, making it well worth a visit.

name: Barisal
description: Barisal is one of the most important districts of the Ganges delta region, rich in rivers, canal-bills, forests and natural diversity.

name: Sylhet
description: There are also several handicraft cottage industries, including mat weaving and bamboo work. Tea estates southeast of Sylhet provide most of Bangladesh's yield.

name: Rangpur
description: Tourist Attractions in Rangpur Division 路 Tajhat Palace, Rangpur 路 Kantajew Temple, Dinajpur 路 Vinnya Jagat, Rangpur 路 Funcity Amusement Park, Thakurgaon.
